寪字的基本解释

寪
wěi
屋宇开张的样子。
姓。

寪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》韋委切，上紙，云。］
(1)房檐外伸貌。引申为险峻、危险的样子。
(2)姓。春秋有鲁大夫寪氏。见《左传·隐公十一年》。

寪字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　寪； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页292第03
【唐韻】韋委切【集韻】羽委切，?音蔿。【說文】屋貌。　又姓。【左傳·隱十一年】館于寪氏。　又【集韻】虞爲切，音危。隉寪，不安貌。

考證：〔【左傳·隱十一年】公館于寪氏。〕　謹照原文省公字。
寪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
寪字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Lao
wěi
The house opened.
name.
Lao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guang Yun" Wei Wei cut, on paper, cloud. ]
(1) The outward appearance of the eaves. The extension is precipitous and dangerous.
(2) Last name. In Spring and Autumn, there is Dr. Lu's Lao family. See "Zuo Zhuan · Yin Gong Eleven Years".
Lao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Yin Ji 1】【Liu Zi Department】　寪; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 292 03
[Tang Yun] Wei Weiqi [Ji Yun] Yu Weiqi,? Yin Lin. [Said the text] The appearance of the house.　Another last name. [Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Eleven Years] Guan Yu Lao's family.　[Jiyun] Yu is cut, the sound is dangerous. Xiangyao, uneasy appearance. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Eleventh Year] Yu Lao's mansion. 〕　I would like to save the public characters according to the original text.
